ValidationRule.description: Rep may not input this information unless Explore Date is populated with a date of today or past.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( ISNULL( Explore_Date__c) ,Explore_Date__c > TODAY()), NOT( ISPICKVAL (Downloaded_Paychex_Icon__c, "")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: *** YOU MAY NOT ANSWER DOWNLOAD QUESTION UNTIL EXPLORE DATE IS FILLED IN WITH A DATE OF TODAY OR EARLIER ***
